resources.string: Hi there! My name is Mateus, I am a 27-year-old Brazilian developer and this is my first Android app. Go ahead, tap the buttons below to learn a bit more about me!
Currently pursuing a undergraduate degree in Computer Science from Dorset College, Dublin, Ireland.
Certified Electronics Technician from Colégio São Miguel, Passa Quatro, MG, Brazil.
Knowledge in OOP languages such as Python, C#, C++, Java and Kotlin.
Knowledge in languages such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as back-end technologies as MySQL and Node.js.
Knowledge in Android development and Android Studio.
I speak brazilian portuguese (native) and english, both fluently.

Listening to music is one of my favorite things in life. I am a big fan of rock and metal, especially progressive. Some of my favorite artists include Dream Theater, Opeth, Symphony X, Angra and many others.
I enjoy watching movies and TV series on my free time. As a fan of sci-fi and fantasy, I love the likes of Star Wars and The Lord of The Rings. I am also really into cartoons and animes.
A childhood hobby, video games have always been part of my life. From Mega Man and Metroid to Final Fantasy and Heroes of Might and Magic, I have spent hours on them, especially the RPGs.
Massive football fan. Vasco da Gama supporter and strong Chelsea sympathizer, so to speak, I have been following the beautiful game for my whole life.
Not exactly a bookworm, but I certainly enjoy my occasional read. Lovecraft, Tolkien and William Gibson amongst my favorites.
Now, this is embarrassing. Maybe come back later, sometime, perhaps there will be something here by then… Whenever that is.
